titleStmt.title: The creatures goodness, as they came out of God's hands, and the good mans mercy to the brute creatures, which God hath put under his feet in two sermons : the first preached before the University of Oxford : the second at the lecture at Brackley / by Thomas Hodges ...
titleStmt.author: Hodges, Thomas, d. 1688.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
